nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'CFCGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFCTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'CFCGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_CFC11
nml_option.description: if true, CFC11 is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_CFC12
nml_option.description: if true, CFC12 is enabled for the run

package.name: CFCTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include CFCGRP.

package.name: CFCTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the CFC tracer group.

package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the CFC tracer group.

package.name: CFCTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the CFC tracer group.

package.name: CFCTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the CFC tracer group.

package.name: CFCTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the CFC tracer group.

package.name: CFCTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the CFC tracer group.

var.name: CFC11PistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which CFC11 is restored to CFC11SurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: CFC12PistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which CFC12 is restored to CFC12SurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: CFC11SurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Tracer is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by CFC11PistonVelocity.

var.name: CFC12SurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Tracer is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by CFC12PistonVelocity.

var.name: CFC11InteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which CFC11 is restored to CFC11InteriorRestoringValue

var.name: CFC12InteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which CFC12 is restored to CFC12InteriorRestoringValue

var.name: CFC11InteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Tracer is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by CFC11InteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: CFC12InteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Tracer is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by CFC12InteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: CFC11ExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of CFC11

var.name: CFC12ExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of CFC12

var.name: CFC12IdealAgeMask
